aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-3946-880 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Paint coating disbondment. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 31/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 01/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 02/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 04/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 09/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
